item.title: who I am
item.description: I quantify and reduce uncertainty by applying mathematical theory and leveraging the power of storytelling to explain complicated concepts. I am Michael Pilosov, PhD Third Generation Artist, Machine Learning Architect, & Scientific Software Engineer I combine art, math, and machines to build wonderful things. view resume I write code for people, not machines. I am a bridge. I approach education and software engineering as art. I enable experts to make better decisions by building them new tools for innovation and sharpening their existing ones.

item.title: architect & engineer
item.description: Software Contributions I learned so much from free software and feel the need to contribute back. When I do things now, I make them available so that people can learn from my trials and tribulations. I believe in making complicated things easier for people to digest, and software contributions is one way I do it. ML Starter-Packs ml-starter-packs is a Github organization I created to house relatively polished projects for public consumption.
